body:
Been meaning to fix this for a while now. On many systems, envoking `vi` runs vim in compatibility-mode. Many of the vim commands you've come to know and love don't work and `~/.vimrc` doesn't get sourced. The new order of precedence is:

1. `EDITOR`
2. `vim`
3. `vi`

@JusticeForMikeBrown
title: vim > vi
